p: During the two rounds of swine infection model experiments, S-O 2009 IV aerosols were detected at the beginning of 1 day post-infection (dpi) in isolator A, peaked (4.87, 4.40 log 10copies/m 3 air) at 5 and 4 dpi, and was absent from 12 or 13 dpi. In isolator B, S-O 2009 IV aerosols were detected at 2 dpi, peaked (3.62, 3.27 log 10copies/m 3 air) at 5 and 4 dpi, and was absent after 10 or 11 dpi (FigureÂ 1A).
